meanings.definition: Of or relating to a totem
meanings.sent1: The totemic symbols were painted on the walls of the ancient cave.
meanings.sent2: The tribe's totemic beliefs were deeply ingrained in their culture.
meanings.sent3: The totemic animal danced around the fire, entertaining the children.
meanings.sent4: Her totemic connection to the wolf represented her fierce loyalty.
meanings.sent5: The totemic mask glowed in the dim light, captivating all who saw it.
